SELECT w.WC_NAME, w.WC_NUM, s.`NAME`, s.TYPE_APPLICATION, s.MONEY, SUM(ws.AMOUNT) AS amount, ws.`YEAR`, ws.`MONTH`, ws.`DAY`, ws.WC_ID AS wcId, ws.STOREROOM_ID FROM p_wc_storeroom AS ws LEFT JOIN cy_wc AS w ON(w.WC_ID=ws.WC_ID) LEFT JOIN cy_storeroom AS s ON(s.ID=ws.STOREROOM_ID) WHERE w.WC_OWN=#{wcStoreroom.wcOwn} AND (ws.`YEAR`=#{wcStoreroom.yearForm} AND FIND_IN_SET(ws.`MONTH`,#{wcStoreroom.monthForm}))
OR (ws.`YEAR`=#{wcStoreroom.yearTo} AND FIND_IN_SET(ws.`MONTH`,#{wcStoreroom.monthTo}))
AND w.WC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wcStoreroom.wcName},'%')
AND w.WC_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wcStoreroom.wcNum},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(s.TYPE_APPLICATION, #{wcStoreroom.typeApplication})
AND s.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wcStoreroom.name},'%')
GROUP BY ws.WC_ID,ws.STOREROOM_id,ws.`YEAR`,ws.`MONTH` DESC
